What we do ?
Are you looking for thoughtful solutions and a program that was created with the thought about users, not being only hermetic products for developers?
it-solve is a company that was established to create neatly designed, user- friendly and secure dedicated high- performance products. Our business idea is to create a company that focuses on the customer and not our benefits. We would like to transfer our services and knowledge for the best possible service for our customers. That is why we work in the SCRUM methodology. We work on a step-by-step basis. At each stage of your work we take your point of view and try to understand the essence of your needs.
